title: Black screen in champ select
body:
Hey, recently when i accept a que pop in blind pick (norms) after everyone has accepted and it kind of flickers to the champ select screen, I've been given a black screen. it completely negates being able to communicate or select a champ, it happens maybe once every 20 games.? i play on MAC OSX and have only started having this issue about a month ago, i never really minded as it was a big deal, but noe I'm getting punished for not picking a champ when i can't do anything, 
Im not sure id this is a common problem but id thought id throw it out there so hopefully it can get solved and not be a issue for anyone else, please and thanks !

replies.body:
Hey there,

While I'm not 100% certain on a fix for this, some users have reported that pressing their enter (return) key at champ select a few times resolves the problem.

it's also possible that a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#mq6) may help, give that a go and let me know if it helps out.
